title: Herbal Medicine for Pets in Hilton Head, SC | Island Holistic Veterinary Center
description: Herbal medicine is a branch of Traditional Chinese Medicine that can be combined with other treatments to relieve a variety of conditions in pets.
cleaned_text: Some Common Uses of Chinese Herbal Medicine in Pets Herbal medicine has many uses, and works best in conjunction with other therapies, such as acupuncture and food therapy. Indications for herbal medicine may include: - Pain relief and management - Allergies - Disorders of the immune system - Digestive issues - Skin disorders - Respiratory disorders - Reproductive issues - ...and more
